Posts.EditableText: 21th of May, 1983, Flordia - Miami "Alright, Tiger. Let me get this straight. We caught you in the act of bursting open the skull of the Cuban gang leader, Pablo Cortez. And you're telling me that you had no control over the rampage and havoc you caused over the past three months. Because of the mysterious voicemails found on your answering machine which told you where to go." "Detective Murphy, that is how it exactly went down." Quest link: http://play2.textadventures.co.uk/Play.aspx?id=arcq28gf7esst-rgwpe7cw
Posts.HTML:
21th of May, 1983, Flordia - Miami

"Alright, Tiger. Let me get this straight. We caught you in the act of bursting open the skull of the Cuban gang leader, Pablo Cortez. And you're telling me that you had no control over the rampage and havoc you caused over the past three months. Because of the mysterious voicemails found on your answering machine which told you where to go."

"Detective Murphy, that is how it exactly went down."

Quest link: http://play2.textadventures.co.uk/Play.aspx?id=arcq28gf7esst-rgwpe7cw
